comment: /**  * Writes the given block. The request may be executed synchronously, or asynchronously, depending  * on the implementation.  *  * @param block The segment to be written (transferring ownership to this writer).  * @throws IOException Thrown, when the writer encounters an I/O error.  */
code: /**  * Writes the given block. The request may be executed synchronously, or asynchronously, depending  * on the implementation.  *  * @param block The segment to be written (transferring ownership to this writer).  * @throws IOException Thrown, when the writer encounters an I/O error.  */ void writeBlock(T block) throws IOException.
